        public Tile[][] getBoard()
        Used to get the board

        gets specific tile based on row and col
        Parameters:

        col - col of tile getting called
        Returns:

      • move

        public void move​(Tile start,
                 Tile end)
        Moves the pieces and if there is a piece to be captured, it captures it.
        Parameters:
        start - The location of the piece that is being moved
        end - where the piece is going to be moved

      • gameOver

        public int gameOver​(Player player1,
                    Player player2)
        Tests if there is already an animal piece inside the players' animal dens and if the players still have pieces left
        Parameters:
        player1 - the player1
        player2 - the player2
        Returns:
        returns 2 if player 2 wins, 1 if player 1 wins, 0 if there is still no winner

      • validPiece

        public boolean validPiece​(Player player,
                          int row,
                          int col)
        Tests if the selected piece is owned by current player and if there is a piece to be moved
        Parameters:
        player - current player
        row - row location of the piece being moved
        col - column location of the piece being moved
        Returns:
        true if it can be moved otherwise, false

      • validMove

        public boolean validMove​(Player player,
                         int startRow,
                         int startCol,
                         int endRow,
                         int endCol)
        Tests all the mechanics and movement of the game on the piece being moved If the move passes the tests, the move will be executed at the end
        Parameters:
        player - the player that is currently in turn
        startRow - the index of the row of the starting piece
        startCol - the index of the column of the starting piece
        endRow - the index of the row of the ending location
        endCol - the index of the col of the ending location
        Returns:
        true if the move is valid and has been updated, false if otherwise
